Text: Since the last few days you have been uploading some great books - some within my scope of knowledge and others ......not so comprehensible for lesser mortals like me.I take this opportunity to thank you for your efforts.

Pleasure//
Some calls my posts fake, if u really like d post 'n wanna thank d author of d book (his / her effort is much more than me) hit + quality 2 indicate as good staff.

This book is above my skill level, but sharing is caring, so you deserve another +1.

I'd appreciate a good geomety book at first/second year university level, if you have one.
